metadata.inclusion:
Start master controller add device mode as instruction, press and hold the channel 1 touch icon (located on leftmost) for 2 second, RF icon LED on right bottom flash
indicator inclusion processing until included or 60 seconds timeout no detect any master controller
metadata.exclusion:
Start master controller remove device mode as instruction, press and hold the channel 1 touch icon (located on leftmost) for 2 second, RF icon LED on right bottom flash indicator inclusion processing until included or 15 seconds timeout no detect any master controller.
LED flash slowly indicated has no included any controller
metadata.reset:
The factory default settings are restored when the device is removed from the network.
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
